A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: it sucked with painfully stupid jokes I would expect from transformers movies\, unintentionally funny moments like when Princess Leia suvives an explosion goes into space and then flys like supermen because plot conviniance. The plot (if your willing to call it that) was as light as a feather for a two and a half hour flick\, stupid characters that make catastrophic choices and painfully shoehorned messages amongst a plethora of other problems.
